attributes.action: COVID-19: Close NI schools and colleges. We all live on this island.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government are not taking this pandemic seriously enough. Action is needed before it's too late.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson needs to stop holding Northern Ireland at ransom. Following the closure of schools, colleges and pre-school settings in the Republic of Ireland, NI ministers should be encouraged to do the same. Prevention at this stage is imperative.
